definition.name: Electron Builder Action
definition.description: GitHub Action for building and releasing Electron apps
definition.author: Samuel Meuli

inputs.name: mac_certs
inputs.description: Base64-encoded code signing certificate for macOS

inputs.name: release
inputs.description: Whether the app should be released after a successful build

inputs.name: windows_certs
inputs.description: Base64-encoded code signing certificate for Windows

inputs.name: package_root
inputs.description: Directory where NPM/Yarn commands should be run

inputs.name: build_script_name
inputs.description: Name of the optional NPM build script which is executed before `electron-builder`

inputs.name: skip_build
inputs.description: Whether the action should execute the NPM build script before running `electron-builder`

inputs.name: use_vue_cli
inputs.description: Whether to run `electron-builder` using the Vue CLI plugin instead of calling the command directly

inputs.name: args
inputs.description: Other arguments to pass to the `electron-builder` command, e.g. configuration overrides

inputs.name: max_attempts
inputs.description: Maximum number of attempts for completing the build and release step

inputs.name: app_root
inputs.description: Directory where `electron-builder` commands should be run
